com.mongodb.util
Class ConnectionPoolStatisticsBean

java.lang.Object
  com.mongodb.util.ConnectionPoolStatisticsBean
Deprecated. This class will be removed in 3.x versions of the driver, so please remove it from your compile time dependencies. 

@Deprecated
public class ConnectionPoolStatisticsBean
extends java.lang.Object

A bean representing connection pool statistics.
